Title: Extends provisions of law relating to adjudications and owner liability for a violation of traffic-control signal indications in Nassau county
Summary: Extends provisions of law relating to adjudications and owner liability for a violation of traffic-control signal indications in Nassau county until 2024.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 19 of the laws of 2009, amending the vehicle and traffic law and other laws relating to adjudications and owner liability for a violation of traffic-control signal indications, in relation to extending the provisions of such chapter
